```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE)
```

Discus Throw Performance Analysis
Keywords: 
PBP = Peak backswing position (beginning of throw) 
RFO = Right foot take-off 
LFO = Left foot take-off 
RFD = Right foot touch-down 
LFD = left foot touch-down 
F = Release 

```{r}
phases <- tibble::tribble(
  ~"Key phase", ~"Definition",
  "Preparation", "From PBP to RFO.",
  "Entry", "From RFO to LFO.",
  "Airborne", "From LFO to RFD.",
  "Delivery / Power", "From LFD to release"
)
knitr::kable(phases, booktabs=TRUE)

```
